name: Cheesy Broccoli Rice Casserole
author: Bob Manasco
summary: This creamy side dish cooks in the microwave for only 15 minutes, so it's easy to put together quickly.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed
directions: Place cheese in a 2-quart microwave-safe casserole dish; cook in microwave until mostly melted, 1 to 2 minutes
Stir in chicken soup, wild rice, broccoli, chopped onion, celery, hot sauce, and black pepper
Microwave until fully cooked and bubbling, 12 to 14 minutes, rotating halfway through cooking
Sprinkle French-fried onions over casserole; cook for 1 more minute
